A kernel-mode heap overflow occurs when malformed probe response frame is received that contains a long SSID field  This DoS was tested with version 2.3.1.10 of the WG311ND5.SYS driver and a NetGear WG311v1 PCI card. A remote code execution module is also in development.  This module depends on the Lorcon2 library and only works on the Linux platform with a supported wireless card. Please see the Ruby Lorcon2 documentation (external/ruby-lorcon/README) for more information.

vertices.shortDescription: Multiple Wireless Vendor NULL SSID Probe Response
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a firmware-level vulnerability in a variety of 802.11b devices. This attack works by sending a probe response frame containing a NULL SSID information element to an affected device. This flaw affects many cards based on the Choice MAC (Intersil, Lucent, Agere, Orinoco, and the first generation of Airport cards).

vertices.shortDescription: Wireless Beacon SSID Emulator
vertices.fullDescription: This module sends out beacon frames using SSID's identified in a specified file and randomly selected BSSID's. This is useful when combined with a Karmetasploit attack to get clients configured to not probe for networks in their PNL to start probing when they see a matching SSID in from this script. For a list of common SSID's to use with this script, check http://www.wigle.net/gps/gps/main/ssidstats. If a file of SSID's is not specified, a default list of 20 SSID's will be used. This script will run indefinitely until interrupted.

vertices.shortDescription: Wireless Test Module
vertices.fullDescription: This module is a test of the wireless packet injection system.  Please see external/ruby-lorcon/README for more information.

vertices.shortDescription: Appian Enterprise Business Suite 5.6 SP1 DoS
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a denial of service flaw in the Appian Enterprise Business Suite service.

vertices.shortDescription: Microsoft Windows EOT Font Table Directory Integer Overflow
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits an integer overflow flaw in the Microsoft Windows Embedded  OpenType font parsing code located in win32k.sys. Since the kernel itself parses  embedded web fonts, it is possible to trigger a BSoD from a normal web page when  viewed with Internet Explorer.

vertices.shortDescription: FileZilla FTP Server Admin Interface Denial of Service
vertices.fullDescription: This module triggers a Denial of Service condition in the FileZilla FTP Server Administration Interface in versions 0.9.4d and earlier. By sending a procession of excessively long USER commands to the FTP Server, the Administration Interface (FileZilla Server Interface.exe) when running, will overwrite the stack with our string and generate an exception. The FileZilla FTP Server itself will continue functioning.

vertices.shortDescription: FileZilla FTP Server <=0.9.21 Malformed PORT Denial of Service
vertices.fullDescription: This module triggers a Denial of Service condition in the FileZilla FTP Server versions 0.9.21 and earlier. By sending a malformed PORT command then LIST command, the server attempts to write to a NULL pointer.

vertices.shortDescription: Guild FTPd 0.999.8.11/0.999.14 Heap Corruption
vertices.fullDescription: Guild FTPd 0.999.8.11 and 0.999.14 are vulnerable to heap corruption. You need to have a valid login so you can run CWD and LIST.

vertices.shortDescription: Microsoft IIS FTP Server Encoded Response Overflow Trigger
vertices.fullDescription: This module triggers a heap overflow when processing a specially crafted FTP request containing Telnet IAC (0xff) bytes. When constructing the response, the Microsoft IIS FTP Service overflows the heap buffer with 0xff bytes.  This issue can be triggered pre-auth and may in fact be explotiable for remote code execution.

vertices.shortDescription: Microsoft IIS FTP Server <= 7.0 LIST Stack Exhaustion
vertices.fullDescription: This module triggers Denial of Service condition in the Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS) FTP Server 5.0 through 7.0 via a list (ls) -R command containing a wildcard. For this exploit to work in most cases, you need 1) a valid ftp account: either read-only or write-access account 2) the "FTP Publishing" must be configured as "manual" mode in startup type 3) there must be at least one directory under FTP root directory. If your provided an FTP account has write-access privilege and there is no single directory, a new directory with random name will be created prior to sending exploit payload.

vertices.shortDescription: Solar FTP Server <= 2.1.1 Malformed (User) Denial of Service
vertices.fullDescription: This module will send a format string as USER to Solar FTP, causing a READ violation in function "__output_1()" found in "sfsservice.exe" while trying to calculate the length of the string.

vertices.shortDescription: Titan FTP Server 6.26.630 SITE WHO DoS
vertices.fullDescription: The Titan FTP server v6.26 build 630 can be DoS'd by issuing "SITE WHO". You need a valid login so you can send this command.

vertices.shortDescription: Victory FTP Server 5.0 LIST DoS
vertices.fullDescription: The Victory FTP Server v5.0 can be brought down by sending a very simple LIST command

vertices.shortDescription: WinFTP 2.3.0 NLST Denial of Service
vertices.fullDescription: This module is a very rough port of Julien Bedard's PoC. You need a valid login, but even anonymous can do it if it has permission to call NLST.

vertices.shortDescription: XM Easy Personal FTP Server 5.6.0 NLST DoS
vertices.fullDescription: This module is a port of shinnai's script. You need a valid login, but even anonymous can do it as long as it has permission to call NLST.

vertices.shortDescription: XM Easy Personal FTP Server 5.7.0 NLST DoS
vertices.fullDescription: You need a valid login to DoS this FTP server, but even anonymous can do it as long as it has permission to call NLST.

vertices.shortDescription: Kaillera 0.86 Server Denial of Service
vertices.fullDescription: The Kaillera 0.86 server can be shut down by sending any malformed packet after the intial "hello" packet.

vertices.shortDescription: Microsoft IIS 6.0 ASP Stack Exhaustion Denial of Service
vertices.fullDescription: The vulnerability allows remote unauthenticated attackers to force the IIS server to become unresponsive until the IIS service is restarted manually by the administrator. Required is that Active Server Pages are hosted by the IIS and that an ASP script reads out a Post Form value.

vertices.shortDescription: Pi3Web <=2.0.13 ISAPI DoS
vertices.fullDescription: The Pi3Web HTTP server crashes when a request is made for an invalid DLL file in /isapi. By default, the non-DLLs in this directory after installation are users.txt, install.daf and readme.daf.

vertices.shortDescription: Microsoft Windows DNSAPI.dll LLMNR Buffer Underrun DoS
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a buffer underrun vulnerability in Microsoft's DNSAPI.dll as distributed with Windows Vista and later without KB2509553. By sending a specially crafted LLMNR query, containing a leading '.' character, an attacker can trigger stack exhaustion or potentially cause stack memory corruption.  Although this vulnerability may lead to code execution, it has not been proven to be possible at the time of this writing.  NOTE: In some circumstances, a '.' may be found before the top of the stack is reached. In these cases, this module may not be able to cause a crash.

vertices.shortDescription: Microsoft Windows NAT Helper Denial of Service
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a denial of service vulnerability within the Internet Connection Sharing service in Windows XP.

vertices.shortDescription: MS12-020 Microsoft Remote Desktop Use-After-Free DoS
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits the MS12-020 RDP vulnerability originally discovered and reported by Luigi Auriemma. The flaw can be found in the way the T.125 ConnectMCSPDU packet is handled in the maxChannelIDs field, which will result an invalid pointer being used, therefore causing a denial-of-service condition.

vertices.shortDescription: Microsoft Plug and Play Service Registry Overflow
vertices.fullDescription: This module triggers a stack buffer overflow in the Windows Plug and Play service. This vulnerability can be exploited on Windows 2000 without a valid user account. Since the PnP service runs inside the service.exe process, this module will result in a forced reboot on Windows 2000. Obtaining code execution is possible if user-controlled memory can be placed at 0x00000030, 0x0030005C, or 0x005C005C.

vertices.shortDescription: Microsoft SRV.SYS Mailslot Write Corruption
vertices.fullDescription: This module triggers a kernel pool corruption bug in SRV.SYS. Each  call to the mailslot write function results in a two byte return value  being written into the response packet. The code which creates this packet  fails to consider these two bytes in the allocation routine, resulting in  a slow corruption of the kernel memory pool. These two bytes are almost  always set to "\xff\xff" (a short integer with value of -1).

vertices.shortDescription: Microsoft SRV.SYS Pipe Transaction No Null
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a NULL pointer dereference flaw in the  SRV.SYS driver of the Windows operating system. This bug was  independently discovered by CORE Security and ISS.

vertices.shortDescription: Microsoft SRV.SYS WriteAndX Invalid DataOffset
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a denial of service vulnerability in the SRV.SYS driver of the Windows operating system.  This module has been tested successfully against Windows Vista.

vertices.shortDescription: Microsoft SRV2.SYS SMB Negotiate ProcessID Function Table Dereference
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits an out of bounds function table dereference in the SMB  request validation code of the SRV2.SYS driver included with Windows Vista, Windows 7  release candidates (not RTM), and Windows 2008 Server prior to R2. Windows Vista  without SP1 does not seem affected by this flaw.

vertices.shortDescription: Microsoft SRV2.SYS SMB2 Logoff Remote Kernel NULL Pointer Dereference
vertices.fullDescription: This module triggers a NULL pointer dereference in the SRV2.SYS kernel driver when processing an SMB2 logoff request before a session has been correctly negotiated, resulting in a BSOD. Effecting Vista SP1/SP2 (And possibly Server 2008 SP1/SP2), the flaw was resolved with MS09-050.

vertices.shortDescription: Microsoft Windows 7 / Server 2008 R2 SMB Client Infinite Loop
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a denial of service flaw in the Microsoft Windows SMB client on Windows 7 and Windows Server 2008 R2. To trigger this bug, run this module as a service and forces a vulnerabile client to access the IP of this system as an SMB server. This can be accomplished by embedding a UNC path (\HOST\share\something) into a web page if the target is using Internet Explorer, or a Word document otherwise.

vertices.shortDescription: Microsoft Windows SRV.SYS SrvSmbQueryFsInformation Pool Overflow DoS
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a denial of service flaw in the Microsoft Windows SMB service on versions of Windows prior to the August 2010 Patch Tuesday. To trigger this bug, you must be able to access a share with at least read privileges. That generally means you will need authentication. However, if a system has a guest accessible share, you can trigger it without any authentication.

vertices.shortDescription: Microsoft Windows Browser Pool DoS
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a denial of service flaw in the Microsoft Windows SMB service on versions of Windows Server 2003 that have been configured as a domain controller. By sending a specially crafted election request, an attacker can cause a pool overflow.  The vulnerability appears to be due to an error handling a length value while calculating the amount of memory to copy to a buffer. When there are zero bytes left in the buffer, the length value is improperly decremented and an integer underflow occurs. The resulting value is used in several calculations and is then passed as the length value to an inline memcpy operation.  Unfortunately, the length value appears to be fixed at -2 (0xfffffffe) and causes considerable damage to kernel heap memory. While theoretically possible, it does not appear to be trivial to turn this vulnerability into remote (or even local) code execution.

vertices.shortDescription: Microsoft RRAS InterfaceAdjustVLSPointers NULL Dereference
vertices.fullDescription: This module triggers a NULL dereference in svchost.exe on  all current versions of Windows that run the RRAS service. This  service is only accessible without authentication on Windows XP  SP1 (using the SRVSVC pipe).

vertices.shortDescription: Microsoft Vista SP0 SMB Negotiate Protocol DoS
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a flaw in Windows Vista that allows a remote  unauthenticated attacker to disable the SMB service. This vulnerability  was silently fixed in Microsoft Vista Service Pack 1.

vertices.shortDescription: MS06-019 Exchange MODPROP Heap Overflow
vertices.fullDescription: This module triggers a heap overflow vulnerability in MS Exchange that occurs when multiple malformed MODPROP values occur in a VCAL request.

vertices.shortDescription: Sysax Multi-Server 6.10 SSHD Key Exchange Denial of Service
vertices.fullDescription: This module sends a specially-crafted SSH Key Exchange causing the service to crash.

vertices.shortDescription: PacketTrap TFTP Server 2.2.5459.0 DoS
vertices.fullDescription: The PacketTrap TFTP server version 2.2.5459.0 can be brought down by sending a special write request.

vertices.shortDescription: SolarWinds TFTP Server 10.4.0.10 Denial of Service
vertices.fullDescription: The SolarWinds TFTP server can be shut down by sending a 'netascii' read request with a specially crafted file name.

vertices.shortDescription: Wireshark chunked_encoding_dissector function DOS
vertices.fullDescription: Wireshark crash when dissecting an HTTP chunked response. Versions affected: 0.99.5 (Bug 1394)

vertices.shortDescription: Wireshark CLDAP Dissector DOS
vertices.fullDescription: This module causes infinite recursion to occur within the CLDAP dissector by sending a specially crafted UDP packet.

vertices.shortDescription: Wireshark LDAP dissector DOS
vertices.fullDescription: The LDAP dissector in Wireshark 0.99.2 through 0.99.8 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) via a malformed packet.

vertices.shortDescription: DNS and DNSSEC Fuzzer
vertices.fullDescription: This module will connect to a DNS server and perform DNS and DNSSEC protocol-level fuzzing. Note that this module may inadvertently crash the target server.

vertices.shortDescription: Simple FTP Client Fuzzer
vertices.fullDescription: This module will serve an FTP server and perform FTP client interaction fuzzing

vertices.shortDescription: Simple FTP Fuzzer
vertices.fullDescription: This module will connect to a FTP server and perform pre- and post-authentication fuzzing

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP Form Field Fuzzer
vertices.fullDescription: This module will grab all fields from a form, and launch a series of POST actions, fuzzing the contents of the form fields. You can optionally fuzz headers too (option is enabled by default)

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP GET Request URI Fuzzer (Incrementing Lengths)
vertices.fullDescription: This module sends a series of HTTP GET request with incrementing URL lengths.

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP GET Request URI Fuzzer (Fuzzer Strings)
vertices.fullDescription: This module sends a series of HTTP GET request with malicious URIs.

vertices.shortDescription: SMB Negotiate SMB2 Dialect Corruption
vertices.fullDescription: This module sends a series of SMB negiotiate requests that advertise a  SMB2 dialect with corrupted bytes.

vertices.shortDescription: SMB Create Pipe Request Fuzzer
vertices.fullDescription: This module sends a series of SMB create pipe  requests using malicious strings.

vertices.shortDescription: SMB Create Pipe Request Corruption
vertices.fullDescription: This module sends a series of SMB create pipe requests with corrupted bytes.

vertices.shortDescription: SMB Negotiate Dialect Corruption
vertices.fullDescription: This module sends a series of SMB negiotiate requests with corrupted bytes

vertices.shortDescription: SMB NTLMv1 Login Request Corruption
vertices.fullDescription: This module sends a series of SMB login requests using  the NTLMv1 protocol with corrupted bytes.

vertices.shortDescription: SMB Tree Connect Request Fuzzer
vertices.fullDescription: This module sends a series of SMB tree connect  requests using malicious strings.

vertices.shortDescription: SMB Tree Connect Request Corruption
vertices.fullDescription: This module sends a series of SMB tree connect requests with corrupted bytes.

vertices.shortDescription: SMTP Simple Fuzzer
vertices.fullDescription: SMTP Simple Fuzzer

vertices.shortDescription: SSH Key Exchange Init Corruption
vertices.fullDescription: This module sends a series of SSH requests with a corrupted initial key exchange payload.

vertices.shortDescription: SSH 1.5 Version Fuzzer
vertices.fullDescription: This module sends a series of SSH requests with malicious version strings.

vertices.shortDescription: SSH 2.0 Version Fuzzer
vertices.fullDescription: This module sends a series of SSH requests with malicious version strings.

vertices.shortDescription: SSH Version Corruption
vertices.fullDescription: This module sends a series of SSH requests with a corrupted version string

vertices.shortDescription: TDS Protocol Login Request Corruption Fuzzer
vertices.fullDescription: This module sends a series of malformed TDS login requests.

vertices.shortDescription: TDS Protocol Login Request Username Fuzzer
vertices.fullDescription: This module sends a series of malformed TDS login requests.

vertices.shortDescription: Wireless Beacon Frame Fuzzer
vertices.fullDescription: This module sends out corrupted beacon frames.

vertices.shortDescription: Wireless Probe Response Frame Fuzzer
vertices.fullDescription: This module sends out corrupted probe response frames.

vertices.shortDescription: Android Content Provider File Disclosure
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a cross-domain issue within the Android web browser to exfiltrate files from a vulnerable device.

vertices.shortDescription: Apple Safari .webarchive File Format UXSS
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a security context vulnerability that is inherent in Safari's .webarchive file format. The format allows you to specify both domain and content, so we can run arbitrary script in the context of any domain. This allows us to steal cookies, file URLs, and saved passwords from any website we want -- in other words, it is a universal cross-site scripting vector (UXSS). On sites that link to cached javascripts, we can additionally poison user's browser cache and install keyloggers.

vertices.shortDescription: CheckPoint Firewall-1 SecuRemote Topology Service Hostname Disclosure
vertices.fullDescription: This module sends a query to the port 264/TCP on CheckPoint Firewall-1 firewalls to obtain the firewall name and management station (such as SmartCenter) name via a pre-authentication request. The string returned is the CheckPoint Internal CA CN for SmartCenter and the firewall host. Whilst considered "public" information, the majority of installations use detailed hostnames which may aid an attacker in focusing on compromising the SmartCenter host, or useful for government, intelligence and military networks where the hostname reveals the physical location and rack number of the device, which may be unintentionally published to the world.

vertices.shortDescription: Citrix MetaFrame ICA Published Applications Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: This module attempts to query Citrix Metaframe ICA server to obtain a published list of applications.

vertices.shortDescription: Citrix MetaFrame ICA Published Applications Bruteforcer
vertices.fullDescription: This module attempts to brute force program names within the Citrix Metaframe ICA server.

vertices.shortDescription: ColdFusion 'password.properties' Hash Extraction
vertices.fullDescription: This module uses a directory traversal vulnerability to extract information such as password, rdspassword, and "encrypted" properties. This module has been tested successfully on ColdFusion 9 and ColdFusion 10. Use actions to select the target ColdFusion version.

vertices.shortDescription: CorpWatch Company ID Information Search
vertices.fullDescription: This module interfaces with the CorpWatch API to get publicly available info for a given CorpWatch ID of the company. If you don't know the CorpWatch ID, please use the corpwatch_lookup_name module first.

vertices.shortDescription: CorpWatch Company Name Information Search
vertices.fullDescription: This module interfaces with the CorpWatch API to get publicly available info for a given company name. Please note that by using CorpWatch API, you acknolwdge the limitations of the data CorpWatch provides, and should always verify the information with the official SEC filings before taking any action.

vertices.shortDescription: General Electric D20 Password Recovery
vertices.fullDescription: The General Electric D20ME and possibly other units (D200?) feature TFTP readable configurations with plaintext passwords. This module retrieves the username, password, and authentication level list.

vertices.shortDescription: DNS Brutefoce Enumeration
vertices.fullDescription: This module uses a dictionary to perform a bruteforce attack to enumerate hostnames and subdomains available under a given domain.

vertices.shortDescription: DNS Basic Information Enumeration
vertices.fullDescription: This module enumerates basic DNS information for a given domain. The module gets information regarding to A (addresses), AAAA (IPv6 addresses), NS (name servers), SOA (start of authority) and MX (mail servers) records for a given domain. In addition, this module retrieves information stored in TXT records.

vertices.shortDescription: DNS Reverse Lookup Enumeration
vertices.fullDescription: This module performs DNS reverse lookup against a given IP range in order to retrieve valid addresses and names.

vertices.shortDescription: DNS Common Service Record Enumeration
vertices.fullDescription: This module enumerates common DNS service records in a given domain. By setting the ALL_DNS to true, all the name servers of a given domain are used for enumeration. Otherwise only the system dns is used for enumration. in order to get all the available name servers for the given domain the SOA and NS records are queried. In order to convert from domain names to IP addresses queries for A and AAAA (IPv6) records are used.

vertices.shortDescription: Network Shutdown Module <= 3.21 (sort_values) Credential Dumper
vertices.fullDescription: This module will extract user credentials from Network Shutdown Module by exploiting a vulnerability found in lib/dbtools.inc, which uses unsanitized user input inside a eval() call. Please note that in order to extract credentials,the vulnerable service must have at least one USV module (an entry in the "nodes" table in mgedb.db)

vertices.shortDescription: DNS Record Scanner and Enumerator
vertices.fullDescription: This module can be used to gather information about a domain from a given DNS server by performing various DNS queries such as zone transfers, reverse lookups, SRV record bruteforcing, and other techniques.

vertices.shortDescription: Discover External IP via Ifconfig.me
vertices.fullDescription: This module checks for the public source IP address of the current route to the RHOST by querying the public web application at ifconfig.me. It should be noted this module will register activity on ifconfig.me, which is not affiliated with Metasploit.

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP SSL Certificate Impersonation
vertices.fullDescription: This module request a copy of the remote SSL certificate and creates a local (self.signed) version using the information from the remote version. The module then Outputs (PEM|DER) format private key / certificate and a combined version for use in Apache or other Metasploit modules requiring SSLCert Inputs for private key / CA cert have been provided for those with diginator certs hanging about!

vertices.shortDescription: NAT-PMP External Address Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: Scan NAT devices for their external address using NAT-PMP

vertices.shortDescription: Search Engine Domain Email Address Collector
vertices.fullDescription: This module uses Google, Bing and Yahoo to create a list of valid email addresses for the target domain.

vertices.shortDescription: Shodan Search
vertices.fullDescription: This module uses the SHODAN API to query the database and returns the first 50 IPs. SHODAN accounts are free & output can be sent to a file for use by another program. Results can also populated into the services table in the database. NOTE: SHODAN filters (port, hostname, os, geo, city) can be used in queries, but the free API does not allow net, country, before, and after filters. An unlimited API key can be purchased from the Shodan site to use those queries. The 50 result limit can also be raised to 10,000 for a small fee. API: http://www.shodanhq.com/api_doc FILTERS: http://www.shodanhq.com/help/filters

vertices.shortDescription: W3-Total-Cache Wordpress-plugin 0.9.2.4 (or before) Username and Hash Extract
vertices.fullDescription: The W3-Total-Cache Wordpress Plugin <= 0.9.24 can cache database statements and it's results in files for fast access. Version 0.9.2.4 has been fixed afterwards so it can be vulnerable. These cache files are in the webroot of the Wordpress installation and can be downloaded if the name is guessed. This modules tries to locate them with brute force in order to find usernames and password hashes in these files. W3 Total Cache must be configured with Database Cache enabled and Database Cache Method set to Disk to be vulnerable

vertices.shortDescription: XBMC Web Server Directory Traversal
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a directory traversal bug in XBMC 11, up until the 2012-11-04 nightly build. The module can only be used to retrieve files.

vertices.shortDescription: Foxit Reader Authorization Bypass
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a authorization bypass vulnerability in Foxit Reader build 1120. When a attacker creates a specially crafted pdf file containing a Open/Execute action, arbitrary commands can be executed without confirmation from the victim.

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: Brute Force Authentication
vertices.fullDescription: Gain access to various services using brute force modules

vertices.fullDescription: Shut down sessions and clean up user actions

vertices.fullDescription: Locate hosts and services

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: Download a File
vertices.fullDescription: Download a specific file path through a session

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: Exploitation
vertices.fullDescription: Gain access to system using exploits

vertices.fullDescription: Starts an instance of exploit/multi/handler

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: Data Importer
vertices.fullDescription: Process a data file

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: Credential Importer
vertices.fullDescription: Import credential files: user lists, password lists, userpass lists, and pwdump files

vertices.fullDescription: Starts a pre-configured payload listener

vertices.fullDescription: Launch scans in a Nexpose instance, retrieve and import the data

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: Nexpose Asset Group Push
vertices.fullDescription: Create asset groups within Nexpose

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: Nexpose Exception Push
vertices.fullDescription: Create vulnerability exceptions within Nexpose

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: Host Information Normalizer
vertices.fullDescription: Make host and service information consistent

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: Replay All Sucessful Attacks
vertices.fullDescription: Attempt to exploit all previously identified vulnerabilities

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: Multiformat Report Generator
vertices.fullDescription: Generate reports on the current workspace

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: Single Module Execution Agent
vertices.fullDescription: Launch a specific module against one or more systems

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: Social Engineering Campaign Commander Module
vertices.fullDescription: Command-and-control module for SocialEngineering Campaign components

vertices.shortDescription: Pro: Campaigns - HTTP Email Track Dummy Server
vertices.fullDescription: Sins up the http server for email only campaigns

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: Social Engineering Portable File Creator
vertices.fullDescription: Create a payload for the given Portable File

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: Social Engineering Emailer
vertices.fullDescription: Conduct a social engineering attack via email to every address associated with the given Campaign

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: Social Engineering Payload Creator
vertices.fullDescription: Create an executable payload for the given usb key

vertices.shortDescription: Pro: Campaigns - HTTP File Server
vertices.fullDescription: Serves up a File via HTTP

vertices.shortDescription: Pro: Campaigns - HTTP Click Tracking
vertices.fullDescription: Track incoming clicks from a campaign

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: Tunnel
vertices.fullDescription: Creates a tunnel through a specific session for an address range

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: Win32 CMD shell Upgrade
vertices.fullDescription: Upgrade a Win32 CMD Shell to Meterpreter

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: Upload a File
vertices.fullDescription: Upload a specific file to a target

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: Virtual host discovery module
vertices.fullDescription: Discover distinct virtual host (vhost) records for a specific IP address.

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: Not a proxy web server
vertices.fullDescription: Start a web server that sudo proxys calls

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: Web SSL Scan Module
vertices.fullDescription: Scans a Web Server for SSL Support.    It checks to ensure that SSL is supported. It also checks   if weak ciphers are supported by the server. It reports a Web Vuln   if weak ciphers are supported or there is no SSL Support.

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: Web Application Auditor
vertices.fullDescription: Identify web application vulnerabilities

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: OS command injection module
vertices.fullDescription: Identifies OS shell command injection vulnerabilities.

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: OS command injection module (timing)
vertices.fullDescription: Identifies OS shell command injection vulnerabilities using timing attacks.

vertices.fullDescription: Identifies Direct Object Reference vulnerabilities.

vertices.fullDescription: Identifies LDAP injection vulnerabilities.

vertices.fullDescription: Identifies local file inclusion vulnerabilities.

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: WebApp collect module (using Local File Inclusion vulnerabilities)
vertices.fullDescription: Leverages Local File Inclusion WebApp vulnerabilities   to facilitate exfiltration of server-side files.

vertices.fullDescription: Locate web applications and identify forms

vertices.fullDescription: Identifies vulnerable versions of Coppermine Photo Gallery.

vertices.fullDescription: Identifies Credit Card number disclosures.

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: CSRF identification module
vertices.fullDescription: Identifies business-logic-relevant forms without anti-CSRF tokens

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: HTTP PUT module
vertices.fullDescription: Identifies publicly writable server directories

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: Joomla! (v1.5) detection module
vertices.fullDescription: Identifies installation of the Joomla! CMS.

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: MyBB detection module
vertices.fullDescription: Identifies installation of the MyBB forum.

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: Wordpress ( < v1.5.1.3) detection module
vertices.fullDescription: Identifies vulnerable versions of Wordpress.

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: Social Security Number detection module

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: TikiWiki (v1.9.8) detection module
vertices.fullDescription: Identifies a vulnerable version of TikiWiki.

vertices.fullDescription: Identifies a vulnerable version of TikiWiki.

vertices.fullDescription: Identifies a vulnerable version of TikiWiki.

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: Unauthorized access module

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: Web Exploitation
vertices.fullDescription: Obtain data and remote access through vulnerable web applications

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: Quick Pentest Wizard Runner
vertices.fullDescription: Command-and-control module for running all the submodulesof a Quick Pentest wizard under one task.

vertices.shortDescription: PRO: Web App Test Runner
vertices.fullDescription: Command-and-control module for running all the submodulesof a Web App Test under one task.

vertices.shortDescription: Apple Filing Protocol Login Utility
vertices.fullDescription: This module attempts to bruteforce authentication credentials for AFP.

vertices.shortDescription: Apple Filing Protocol Info Enumerator
vertices.fullDescription: This module fetches AFP server information, including server name, network address, supported AFP versions, signature, machine type, and server flags.

vertices.shortDescription: Energizer DUO Trojan Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: Detect instances of the Energizer DUO trojan horse software on port 7777

vertices.shortDescription: CouchDB Enum Utility
vertices.fullDescription: Send a "send_request_cgi()" to enumerate databases and your values on CouchDB (Without authentication by default)

vertices.shortDescription: DB2 Authentication Brute Force Utility
vertices.fullDescription: This module attempts to authenticate against a DB2 instance using username and password combinations indicated by the USER_FILE, PASS_FILE, and USERPASS_FILE options.

vertices.shortDescription: DB2 Probe Utility
vertices.fullDescription: This module queries a DB2 instance information.

vertices.shortDescription: DB2 Discovery Service Detection
vertices.fullDescription: This module simply queries the DB2 discovery service for information.

vertices.shortDescription: Endpoint Mapper Service Discovery
vertices.fullDescription: This module can be used to obtain information from the Endpoint Mapper service.

vertices.shortDescription: Hidden DCERPC Service Discovery
vertices.fullDescription: This module will query the endpoint mapper and make a list  of all ncacn_tcp RPC services. It will then connect to each of  these services and use the management API to list all other  RPC services accessible on this port. Any RPC service found attached  to a TCP port, but not listed in the endpoint mapper, will be displayed  and analyzed to see whether anonymous access is permitted.

vertices.shortDescription: Remote Management Interface Discovery
vertices.fullDescription: This module can be used to obtain information from the Remote Management Interface DCERPC service.

vertices.shortDescription: DCERPC TCP Service Auditor
vertices.fullDescription: Determine what DCERPC services are accessible over a TCP port

vertices.shortDescription: DECT Call Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: This module scans for active DECT calls

vertices.shortDescription: DECT Base Station Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: This module scans for DECT base stations

vertices.shortDescription: ARP Sweep Local Network Discovery
vertices.fullDescription: Enumerate alive Hosts in local network using ARP requests.

vertices.shortDescription: IPv6 Link Local/Node Local Ping Discovery
vertices.fullDescription: Send a ICMPv6 ping request to all default multicast addresses, and wait to see who responds.

vertices.shortDescription: IPv6 Local Neighbor Discovery
vertices.fullDescription: Enumerate local IPv6 hosts which respond to Neighbor Solicitations with a link-local address. Note, that like ARP scanning, this usually cannot be performed beyond the local broadcast network.

vertices.shortDescription: IPv6 Local Neighbor Discovery Using Router Advertisement
vertices.fullDescription: Send a spoofed router advertisement with high priority to force hosts to start the IPv6 address auto-config. Monitor for IPv6 host advertisements, and try to guess the link-local address by concatinating the prefix, and the host portion of the IPv6 address. Use NDP host solicitation to determine if the IP address is valid'

vertices.shortDescription: UDP Service Prober
vertices.fullDescription: Detect common UDP services using sequential probes

vertices.shortDescription: UDP Service Sweeper
vertices.fullDescription: Detect interesting UDP services

vertices.shortDescription: EMC AlphaStor Device Manager Service
vertices.fullDescription: This module queries the remote host for the EMC Alphastor Device Management Service.

vertices.shortDescription: EMC AlphaStor Library Manager Service
vertices.fullDescription: This module queries the remote host for the EMC Alphastor Library Management Service.

vertices.shortDescription: Finger Service User Enumerator
vertices.fullDescription: Identify valid users through the finger service using a variety of tricks

vertices.shortDescription: Anonymous FTP Access Detection
vertices.fullDescription: Detect anonymous (read/write) FTP server access.

vertices.shortDescription: FTP Authentication Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: This module will test FTP logins on a range of machines and report successful logins. If you have loaded a database plugin and connected to a database this module will record successful logins and hosts so you can track your access.

vertices.shortDescription: FTP Version Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: Detect FTP Version.

vertices.shortDescription: Titan FTP XCRC Directory Traversal Information Disclosure
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a directory traversal vulnreability in the XCRC command implemented in versions of Titan FTP up to and including 8.10.1125. By making sending multiple XCRC command, it is possible to disclose the contents of any file on the drive with a simple CRC "brute force" attack.  Although the daemon runs with SYSTEM privileges, access is limited to files that reside on the same drive as the FTP server's root directory.

vertices.shortDescription: H.323 Version Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: Detect H.323 Version.

vertices.shortDescription: Adobe XML External Entity Injection
vertices.fullDescription: Multiple Adobe Products -- XML External Entity Injection. Affected Sofware: BlazeDS 3.2 and earlier versions, LiveCycle 9.0, 8.2.1, and 8.0.1, LiveCycle Data Services 3.0, 2.6.1, and 2.5.1, Flex Data Services 2.0.1, ColdFusion 9.0, 8.0.1, 8.0, and 7.0.2

vertices.shortDescription: Apache ActiveMQ JSP files Source Disclosure
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a source code disclosure in Apache ActiveMQ. The vulnerability is due to the Jetty's ResourceHandler handling of specially crafted URI's starting with //. It has been tested successfully on Apache ActiveMQ 5.3.1 over Windows 2003 SP2 and Ubuntu 10.04.

vertices.shortDescription: Apache ActiveMQ Directory Traversal
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a directory traversal vulnerability in Apache ActiveMQ 5.3.1 and 5.3.2 on Windows systems. The vulnerability exists in the Jetty's ResourceHandler installed with the affected versions. This module has been tested successfully on ActiveMQ 5.3.1 and 5.3.2 over Windows 2003 SP2.

vertices.shortDescription: Apache "mod_userdir" User Enumeration
vertices.fullDescription: Apache with the UserDir directive enabled generates different error  codes when a username exists and there is no public_html directory and when the username  does not exist, which could allow remote attackers to determine valid usernames on the  server.

vertices.shortDescription: Atlassian Crowd XML Entity Expansion Remote File Access
vertices.fullDescription: This module simply attempts to read a remote file from the server using a vulnerability in the way Atlassian Crowd handles XML files. The vulnerability occurs while trying to expand external entities with the SYSTEM identifier. This module has been tested successfully on Linux and Windows installations of Crowd.

vertices.shortDescription: Apache Axis2 v1.4.1 Local File Inclusion
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits an Apache Axis2 v1.4.1 local file inclusion (LFI) vulnerability. By loading a local XML file which contains a cleartext username and password, attackers can trivially recover authentication credentials to Axis services.

vertices.shortDescription: Apache Axis2 v1.4.1 Brute Force Utility
vertices.fullDescription: This module attempts to login to an Apache Axis2 v1.4.1 instance using username and password combindations indicated by the USER_FILE, PASS_FILE, and USERPASS_FILE options.

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP Backup File Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: This module identifies the existence of possible copies of a specific file in a given path.

vertices.shortDescription: Barracuda Multiple Product "locale" Directory Traversal
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a directory traversal vulnerability present in serveral Barracuda products, including the Barracuda Spam and Virus Firewall, Barracuda SSL VPN, and the Barracuda Web Application Firewall. By default, this module will attempt to download the Barracuda configuration file.

vertices.shortDescription: Bitweaver overlay_type Directory Traversal
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a directory traversal vulnerability found in Bitweaver. When hanlding the 'overlay_type' parameter, view_overlay.php fails to do any path checking/filtering, which can be abused to read any file outside the virtual directory.

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP Blind SQL Injection Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: This module identifies the existence of Blind SQL injection issues in GET/POST Query parameters values.

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP Directory Brute Force Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: This module identifies the existence of interesting directories by brute forcing the name in a given directory path.

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP SSL Certificate Checker
vertices.fullDescription: This module will check the certificate of the specified web servers to ensure the subject and issuer match the supplied pattern and that the certificate is not expired.  Note: Be sure to check your expression if using msfcli, shells tend to not like certain things and will strip/interpret them (= is a perfect example). It is better to use in console.

vertices.shortDescription: Cisco Device HTTP Device Manager Access
vertices.fullDescription: This module gathers data from a Cisco device (router or switch) with the device manager web interface exposed. The USERNAME and PASSWORD options can be used to specify authentication.

vertices.shortDescription: Cisco IOS HTTP Unauthorized Administrative Access
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a vulnerability in the Cisco IOS HTTP Server. By sending a GET request for "/level/num/exec/..", where num is between 16 and 99, it is possible to bypass authentication and obtain full system control. IOS 11.3 -> 12.2 are reportedly vulnerable. This module tested successfully against a Cisco 1600 Router IOS v11.3(11d).

vertices.shortDescription: Cisco Network Access Manager Directory Traversal Vulnerability
vertices.fullDescription: This module tests whether a directory traversal vulnerablity is present in versions of Cisco Network Access Manager 4.8.x You may wish to change FILE (e.g. passwd or hosts), MAXDIRS and RPORT depending on your environment.

vertices.shortDescription: ClanSphere 2011.3 Local File Inclusion Vulnerability
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a directory traversal flaw found in Clansphere 2011.3. The application fails to handle the cs_lang parameter properly, which can be used to read any file outside the virtual directory.

vertices.shortDescription: ColdFusion Version Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: This module attempts identify various flavors of ColdFusion up to version 10 as well as the underlying OS.

vertices.shortDescription: ColdFusion Server Check
vertices.fullDescription: This module attempts to exploit the directory traversal in the 'locale' attribute. According to the advisory the following versions are vulnerable:  ColdFusion MX6 6.1 base patches, ColdFusion MX7 7,0,0,91690 base patches, ColdFusion MX8 8,0,1,195765 base patches, ColdFusion MX8 8,0,1,195765 with Hotfix4.  Adobe released patches for ColdFusion 8.0, 8.0.1, and 9 but ColdFusion 9 is reported to have directory traversal protections in place, subsequently this module does NOT work against ColdFusion 9. Adobe did not release patches for ColdFusion 6.1 or ColdFusion 7.  It is not recommended to set FILE when doing scans across a group of servers where the OS may vary; otherwise, the file requested may not make sense for the OS

vertices.shortDescription: Concrete5 Member List Enumeration
vertices.fullDescription: This module extracts username information from the Concrete5 member page

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP Copy File Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: This module identifies the existence of possible copies of a specific file in a given path.

vertices.shortDescription: Web Site Crawler
vertices.fullDescription: Crawl a web site and store information about what was found

vertices.shortDescription: Dell iDRAC default Login
vertices.fullDescription: This module attempts to login to a iDRAC webserver instance using default username and password. Tested against Dell Remote Access Controller 6 - Express version 1.50 and 1.85

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP Directory Listing Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: This module identifies directory listing vulnerabilities in a given directory path.

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP Directory Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: This module identifies the existence of interesting directories in a given directory path.

vertices.shortDescription: MS09-020 IIS6 WebDAV Unicode Auth Bypass Directory Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: This module is based on et's HTTP Directory Scanner module, with one exception. Where authentication is required, it attempts to bypass authentication using the WebDAV IIS6 Unicode vulnerability discovered by Kingcope. The vulnerability appears to be exploitable where WebDAV is enabled on the IIS6 server, and any protected folder requires either Basic, Digest or NTLM authentication.

vertices.shortDescription: DLink DIR-300A / DIR-320 / DIR-615D HTTP Login Utility
vertices.fullDescription: This module attempts to authenticate to different DLink HTTP management services. It has been tested on D-Link DIR-300 Hardware revision A, D-Link DIR-615 Hardware revision D and D-Link DIR-320 devices. It is possible that this module also works with other models.

vertices.shortDescription: DLink DIR-615H HTTP Login Utility
vertices.fullDescription: This module attempts to authenticate to different DLink HTTP management services. It has been tested successfully on D-Link DIR-615 Hardware revision H devices. It is possible that this module also works with other models.

vertices.shortDescription: DLink DIR-300B / DIR-600B / DIR-815 / DIR-645 HTTP Login Utility
vertices.fullDescription: This module attempts to authenticate to different DLink HTTP management services. It has been tested successfully on D-Link DIR-300 Hardware revision B, D-Link DIR-600 Hardware revision B, D-Link DIR-815 Hardware revision A and DIR-645 Hardware revision A devices.It is possible that this module also works with other models.

vertices.shortDescription: Dolibarr ERP & CRM 3 Login Utility
vertices.fullDescription: This module attempts to authenticate to a Dolibarr ERP/CRM's admin web interface, and should only work against version 3.1.1 or older, because these versions do not have any default protections against bruteforcing.

vertices.shortDescription: Drupal Views Module Users Enumeration
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits an information disclosure vulnerability in the 'Views' module of Drupal, brute-forcing the first 10 usernames from 'a' to 'z'

vertices.shortDescription: Ektron CMS400.NET Default Password Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: Ektron CMS400.NET is a web content management system based on .NET. This module tests for installations that are utilizing default passwords set by the vendor. Additionally, it has the ability to brute force user accounts. Note that Ektron CMS400.NET, by default, enforces account lockouts for regular user account after a number of failed attempts.

vertices.shortDescription: Archive.org Stored Domain URLs
vertices.fullDescription: This module pulls and parses the URLs stored by Archive.org for the purpose of replaying during a web assessment. Finding unlinked and old pages.

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP Error Based SQL Injection Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: This module identifies the existence of Error Based SQL injection issues. Still requires alot of work

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP File Same Name Directory Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: This module identifies the existence of files in a given directory path named as the same name of the directory.  Only works if PATH is differenet than '/'.

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP Interesting File Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: This module identifies the existence of interesting files in a given directory path.

vertices.shortDescription: FrontPage Server Extensions Anonymous Login Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: This module queries the FrontPage Server Extensions and determines whether anonymous access is allowed.

vertices.shortDescription: GlassFish Brute Force Utility
vertices.fullDescription: This module attempts to login to GlassFish instance using username and password combindations indicated by the USER_FILE, PASS_FILE, and USERPASS_FILE options.

vertices.shortDescription: Novell Groupwise Agents HTTP Directory Traversal
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a directory traversal vulnerability in Novell Groupwise. The vulnerability exists in the web interface of both the Post Office and the MTA agents. This module has been tested successfully on Novell Groupwise 8.02 HP2 over Windows 2003 SP2.

vertices.shortDescription: HP Intelligent Management FaultDownloadServlet Directory Traversal
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a lack of authentication and a directory traversal in HP Intelligent Management, specifically in the FaultDownloadServlet, in order to retrieve arbitrary files with SYSTEM privileges. This module has been tested successfully on HP Intelligent Management Center 5.1 E0202 over Windows 2003 SP2.

vertices.shortDescription: HP Intelligent Management IctDownloadServlet Directory Traversal
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a lack of authentication and a directory traversal in HP Intelligent Management, specifically in the IctDownloadServlet, in order to retrieve arbitrary files with SYSTEM privileges. This module has been tested successfully on HP Intelligent Management Center 5.1 E0202 over Windows 2003 SP2.

vertices.shortDescription: HP Intelligent Management ReportImgServlt Directory Traversal
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a lack of authentication and a directory traversal in HP Intelligent Management, specifically in the ReportImgServlt, in order to retrieve arbitrary files with SYSTEM privileges. This module has been tested successfully on HP Intelligent Management Center 5.1 E0202 over Windows 2003 SP2.

vertices.shortDescription: HP SiteScope SOAP Call getFileInternal Remote File Access
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits an authentication bypass vulnerability in HP SiteScope to retrieve an arbitrary file from the remote server. It is accomplished by calling the getFileInternal operation available through the APISiteScopeImpl AXIS service. This module has been successfully tested on HP SiteScope 11.20 over Windows 2003 SP2 and Linux Centos 6.3.

vertices.shortDescription: HP SiteScope SOAP Call getSiteScopeConfiguration Configuration Access
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits an authentication bypass vulnerability in HP SiteScope which allows to retrieve the HP SiteScope configuration, including administrative credentials. It is accomplished by calling the getSiteScopeConfiguration operation available through the APISiteScopeImpl AXIS service. The HP SiteScope Configuration is retrieved as file containing Java serialization data. This module has been tested successfully on HP SiteScope 11.20 over Windows 2003 SP2 and Linux Centos 6.3.

vertices.shortDescription: HP SiteScope SOAP Call loadFileContent Remote File Access
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits an authentication bypass vulnerability in HP SiteScope to retrieve an arbitrary text file from the remote server. It is accomplished by calling the loadFileContent operation available through the APIMonitorImpl AXIS service. This module has been successfully tested on HP SiteScope 11.20 over Windows 2003 SP2 and Linux Centos 6.3.

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) Detection
vertices.fullDescription: Display HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) information about each system.

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP Login Utility
vertices.fullDescription: This module attempts to authenticate to an HTTP service.

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP Writable Path PUT/DELETE File Access
vertices.fullDescription: This module can abuse misconfigured web servers to upload and delete web content via PUT and DELETE HTTP requests. Set ACTION to either PUT or DELETE.  PUT is the default. If filename isn't specified, the module will generate a random string for you as a .txt file. If DELETE is used, a filename is required.

vertices.shortDescription: Generic HTTP Directory Traversal Utility
vertices.fullDescription: This module allows you to test if a web server (or web application) is vulnerable to directory traversal with three different actions.  The 'CHECK' action (default) is used to automatically (or manually) find if directory traversal exists in the web server, and then return the path that triggers the vulnerability. The 'DOWNLOAD' action shares the same ability as 'CHECK', but will take advantage of the found trigger to download files based on a 'FILELIST' of your choosing. The 'PHPSOURCE' action can be used to download source against PHP applications. The 'WRITABLE' action can be used to determine if the trigger can be used to write files outside the www directory.  To use the 'COOKIE' option, set your value like so: "name=value".

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP Version Detection
vertices.fullDescription: Display version information about each system

vertices.shortDescription: Http:BL Lookup
vertices.fullDescription: This module can be used to enumerate information about an IP addresses from Project HoneyPot's HTTP Block List.

vertices.shortDescription: Microsoft IIS HTTP Internal IP Disclosure
vertices.fullDescription: Collect any leaked internal IPs by requesting commonly redirected locs from IIS.

vertices.shortDescription: JBoss Vulnerability Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: This module scans a JBoss instance for a few vulnerablities.

vertices.shortDescription: Joomla Page Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: This module scans a Joomla install for common pages.

vertices.shortDescription: Joomla Plugins Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: This module scans a Joomla install for plugins and potential vulnerabilities.

vertices.shortDescription: Joomla Version Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: This module scans a Joomla install for information about the underlying operating system and Joomla version.

vertices.shortDescription: Linksys E1500 Directory Traversal Vulnerability
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a directory traversal vulnerability which is present in different Linksys home routers, like the E1500.

vertices.shortDescription: LiteSpeed Source Code Disclosure/Download
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a source code disclosure/download vulnerability in versions 4.0.14 and prior of LiteSpeed.

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP Microsoft SQL Injection Table XSS Infection
vertices.fullDescription: This module implements the mass SQL injection attack in use lately by concatenation of HTML string that forces a persistant XSS attack to redirect user browser to a attacker controller website.

vertices.shortDescription: Majordomo2 _list_file_get() Directory Traversal
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a directory traversal vulnerability present in the _list_file_get() function of Majordomo2 (help function). By default, this module will attempt to download the Majordomo config.pl file.

vertices.shortDescription: ManageEngine DeviceExpert 5.6 ScheduleResultViewer FileName Traversal
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a directory traversal vulnerability found in ManageEngine DeviceExpert's ScheduleResultViewer Servlet. This is done by using "..\..\..\..\..\..\..\..\..\..\" in the path in order to retrieve a file on a vulnerable machine. Please note that the SSL option is required in order to send HTTP requests.

vertices.shortDescription: ManageEngine SecurityManager Plus 5.5 Directory Traversal
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a directory traversal flaw found in ManageEngine SecurityManager Plus 5.5 or less. When handling a file download request, the DownloadServlet class fails to properly check the 'f' parameter, which can be abused to read any file outside the virtual directory.

vertices.shortDescription: MediaWiki SVG XML Entity Expansion Remote File Access
vertices.fullDescription: This module attempts to read a remote file from the server using a vulnerability in the way MediaWiki handles SVG files. The vulnerability occurs while trying to expand external entities with the SYSTEM identifier. In order to work MediaWiki must be configured to accept upload of SVG files. If anonymous uploads are allowed the username and password aren't required, otherwise they are. This module has been tested successfully on MediaWiki 1.19.4, 1.20.3 on Ubuntu 10.04 and Ubuntu 12.10. Older versions were also tested but do not seem to be vulnerable to this vulnerability. The following MediaWiki requirements must be met: File upload must be enabled, $wgFileExtensions[] must include 'svg', $wgSVGConverter must be set to something other than 'false'.

vertices.shortDescription: Apache HTTPD mod_negotiation Filename Bruter
vertices.fullDescription: This module performs a brute force attack in order to discover existing files on a server which uses mod_negotiation. If the filename is found, the IP address and the files found will be displayed.

vertices.shortDescription: Apache HTTPD mod_negotiation Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: This module scans the webserver of the given host(s) for the existence of mod_negotiate. If the webserver has mod_negotiation enabled, the IP address will be displayed.

vertices.shortDescription: MS09-020 IIS6 WebDAV Unicode Authentication Bypass
vertices.fullDescription: This module attempts to to bypass authentication using the WebDAV IIS6 Unicode vulnerability discovered by Kingcope. The vulnerability appears to be exploitable where WebDAV is enabled on the IIS6 server, and any protected folder requires either Basic, Digest or NTLM authentication.

vertices.shortDescription: NetDecision NOCVision Server Directory Traversal
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a directory traversal bug in NetDecision's TrafficGrapherServer.exe service. This is done by using "...\" in the path to retrieve a file on a vulnerable machine.

vertices.shortDescription: Netgear SPH200D Directory Traversal Vulnerability
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a directory traversal vulnerablity which is present in Netgear SPH200D Skype telephone.

vertices.shortDescription: Nginx Source Code Disclosure/Download
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a source code disclosure/download vulnerability in versions 0.7 and 0.8 of the nginx web server. Versions 0.7.66 and 0.8.40 correct this vulnerability.

vertices.shortDescription: NFR Agent FSFUI Record Arbitrary Remote File Access
vertices.fullDescription: NFRAgent.exe, a component of Novell File Reporter (NFR), allows remote attackers to retrieve arbitrary text files via a directory traversal while handling requests to /FSF/CMD with an FSFUI record with UICMD 126. This module has been tested successfully against NFR Agent 1.0.4.3 (File Reporter 1.0.2) and NFR Agent 1.0.3.22 (File Reporter 1.0.1).

vertices.shortDescription: NFR Agent SRS Record Arbitrary Remote File Access
vertices.fullDescription: NFRAgent.exe, a component of Novell File Reporter (NFR), allows remote attackers to retrieve arbitrary files via a request to /FSF/CMD with a SRS Record with OPERATION 4 and CMD 103, specifying a full pathname. This module has been tested successfully against NFR Agent 1.0.4.3 (File Reporter 1.0.2) and NFR Agent 1.0.3.22 (File Reporter 1.0.1).

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP Open Proxy Detection
vertices.fullDescription: Checks if an HTTP proxy is open. False positive are avoided verifing the HTTP return code and matching a pattern.

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP Options Detection
vertices.fullDescription: Display available HTTP options for each system

vertices.shortDescription: Outlook Web App (OWA) Brute Force Utility
vertices.fullDescription: This module tests credentials on OWA 2003, 2007 and 2010 servers. The default action is set to OWA 2010.

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP Previous Directory File Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: This module identifies files in the first parent directory with same name as the given directory path. Example: Test /backup/files/ will look for the following files /backup/files.ext .

vertices.shortDescription: Ruby on Rails JSON Processor YAML Deserialization Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: This module attempts to identify Ruby on Rails instances vulnerable to an arbitrary object instantiation flaw in the JSON request processor.

vertices.shortDescription: Ruby On Rails Attributes Mass Assignment Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: This module scans Ruby On Rails sites for models with attributes not protected by attr_protected or attr_accessible. After attempting to assign a non-existent field, the default rails with active_record setup will raise an ActiveRecord::UnknownAttributeError exeption, and reply with HTTP code 500.

vertices.shortDescription: Ruby on Rails XML Processor YAML Deserialization Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: This module attempts to identify Ruby on Rails instances vulnerable to an arbitrary object instantiation flaw in the XML request processor.

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP File Extension Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: This module identifies the existence of additional files by modifying the extension of an existing file.

vertices.shortDescription: Apache Reverse Proxy Bypass Vulnerability Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: Scan for poorly configured reverse proxy servers. By default, this module attempts to force the server to make a request with an invalid domain name. Then, if the bypass is successful, the server will look it up and of course fail, then responding with a status code 502. A baseline status code is always established and if that baseline matches your test status code, the injection attempt does not occur. "set VERBOSE true" if you are paranoid and want to catch potential false negatives. Works best against Apache and mod_rewrite

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP Robots.txt Content Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: Detect robots.txt files and analize its content

vertices.shortDescription: S40 0.4.2 CMS Directory Traversal Vulnerability
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a directory traversal vulnerability found in S40 CMS. The flaw is due to the 'page' function not properly handling the $pid parameter, which allows a malicious user to load an arbitrary file path.

vertices.shortDescription: SAP BusinessObjects User Bruteforcer
vertices.fullDescription: This module attempts to bruteforce SAP BusinessObjects users. The dswsbobje interface is only used to verify valid credentials for CmcApp. Therefore, any valid credentials that have been identified can be leveraged by logging into CmcApp.

vertices.shortDescription: SAP BusinessObjects Web User Bruteforcer
vertices.fullDescription: This module simply attempts to bruteforce SAP BusinessObjects users by using CmcApp.

vertices.shortDescription: SAP BusinessObjects User Enumeration
vertices.fullDescription: This module simply attempts to enumerate SAP BusinessObjects users.The dswsbobje interface is only used to verify valid users for CmcApp. Therefore, any valid users that have been identified can be leveraged by logging into CmcApp.

vertices.shortDescription: SAP BusinessObjects Version Detection
vertices.fullDescription: This module simply attempts to identify the version of SAP BusinessObjects.

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP Page Scraper
vertices.fullDescription: Scrap defined data from a specific web page based on a regular expresion

vertices.shortDescription: Simple Web Server 2.3-RC1 Directory Traversal
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a directory traversal vulnerability found in Simple Web Server 2.3-RC1.

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP SOAP Verb/Noun Brute Force Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: This module attempts to brute force SOAP/XML requests to uncover hidden methods.

vertices.shortDescription: Sockso Music Host Server 1.5 Directory Traversal
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a directory traversal bug in Sockso on port 4444. This is done by using "../" in the path to retrieve a file on a vulnerable machine.

vertices.shortDescription: Splunk Web interface Login Utility
vertices.fullDescription: This module simply attempts to login to a Splunk web interface. Please note the free version of Splunk actually does not require any authentication, in that case the module will abort trying. Also, some Splunk applications still have the default credential 'admin:changeme' written on the login page. If this default credential is found, the module will also store that information, and then move on to trying more passwords.

vertices.shortDescription: SQLMAP SQL Injection External Module
vertices.fullDescription: This module launch a sqlmap session. sqlmap is an automatic SQL injection tool developed in Python. Its goal is to detect and take advantage of SQL injection vulnerabilities on web applications. Once it detects one or more SQL injections on the target host, the user can choose among a variety of options to perform an extensive back-end database management system fingerprint, retrieve DBMS session user and database, enumerate users, password hashes, privileges, databases, dump entire or user specific DBMS tables/columns, run his own SQL SELECT statement, read specific files on the file system and much more.

vertices.shortDescription: Squid Proxy Port Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: A misconfigured Squid proxy can allow an attacker to make requests on his behalf. This may give the attacker information about devices that he cannot reach but the Squid proxy can. For example, an attacker can make requests for internal IP addresses against a misconfigurated open Squid proxy exposed to the Internet, therefore performing an internal port scan. The error messages returned by the proxy are used to determine if the port is open or not.  Many Squid proxies use custom error codes so your mileage may vary. The open_proxy module can be used to test for open proxies, though a Squid proxy does not have to be open in order to allow for pivoting (e.g. an Intranet Squid proxy which allows the attack to pivot to another part of the network).

vertices.shortDescription: Squiz Matrix User Enumeration Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: This module attempts to enumernate remote users that exist within the Squiz Matrix and MySource Matrix CMS by sending GET requests for asset IDs e.g. ?a=14 and searching for a valid username eg "~root" or "~test" which is prefixed by a "~" in the response. It will also try to GET the users full name or description, or other information. You may wish to modify ASSETBEGIN and ASSETEND values for greater results, or set VERBOSE. Information gathered may be used for later bruteforce attacks.

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP SSL Certificate Information
vertices.fullDescription: Parse the server SSL certificate to obtain the common name and signature algorithm

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP Subversion Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: Detect subversion directories and files and analize its content. Only SVN Version > 7 supported

vertices.shortDescription: SVN wc.db Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: Scan for servers that allow access to the SVN wc.db file. Based on the work by Tim Meddin.

vertices.shortDescription: Sybase Easerver 6.3 Directory Traversal
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a directory traversal vulnerability found in Sybase EAserver's Jetty webserver on port 8000. Code execution seems unlikely with EAserver's default configuration unless the web server allows WRITE permission.

vertices.shortDescription: Symantec Messaging Gateway 9.5 Log File Download Vulnerability
vertices.fullDescription: This module will download a file of your choice against Symantec Messaging Gateway. This is possible by exploiting a directory traversal vulnerability when handling the 'logFile' parameter, which will load an arbitrary file as an attachment. Note that authentication is required in order to successfully download your file.

vertices.shortDescription: Titan FTP Administrative Password Disclosure
vertices.fullDescription: On Titan FTP servers prior to version 9.14.1628, an attacker can  retrieve the username and password for the administrative XML-RPC  interface, which listens on TCP Port 31001 by default, by sending an  XML request containing bogus authentication information. After sending  this request, the server responds with the legitimate username and  password for the service. With this information, an attacker has  complete control over the FTP service, which includes the ability to  add and remove FTP users, as well as add, remove, and modify  available directories and their permissions.

vertices.shortDescription: Apache Tomcat User Enumeration
vertices.fullDescription: Apache Tomcat user enumeration utility, for Apache Tomcat servers prior to version 6.0.20, 5.5.28, and 4.1.40.

vertices.shortDescription: Tomcat Application Manager Login Utility
vertices.fullDescription: This module simply attempts to login to a Tomcat Application Manager instance using a specific user/pass.

vertices.shortDescription: TP-Link Wireless Lite N Access Point Directory Traversal Vulnerability
vertices.fullDescription: This module tests whether a directory traversal vulnerability is present in versions of TP-Link Access Point 3.12.16 Build 120228 Rel.37317n.

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP TRACE Detection
vertices.fullDescription: Test if TRACE is actually enabled. 405 (Apache) 501(IIS) if its disabled, 200 if it is

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP trace.axd Content Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: Detect trace.axd files and analize its content

vertices.shortDescription: V-CMS Login Utility
vertices.fullDescription: This module attempts to authenticate to an English-based V-CMS login interface. It should only work against version v1.1 or older, because these versions do not have any default protections against bruteforcing.

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP Verb Authentication Bypass Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: This module test for authentication bypass using different HTTP verbs.

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP Virtual Host Brute Force Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: This module tries to identify unique virtual hosts hosted by the target web server.

vertices.shortDescription: VMware Server Directory Traversal Vulnerability
vertices.fullDescription: This modules exploits the VMware Server Directory Traversal vulnerability in VMware Server 1.x before 1.0.10 build 203137 and 2.x before 2.0.2 build 203138 on Linux, VMware ESXi 3.5, and VMware ESX 3.0.3 and 3.5 allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files. Common VMware server ports 80/8222 and 443/8333 SSL. If you want to download the entire VM, check out the gueststealer tool.

vertices.shortDescription: VMWare Update Manager 4 Directory Traversal
vertices.fullDescription: This modules exploits a directory traversal vulnerability in VMWare Update Manager on port 9084. Versions affected by this vulnerability: vCenter Update Manager 4.1 prior to Update 2, vCenter Update Manager 4 Update 4.

vertices.shortDescription: WANGKONGBAO CNS-1000 and 1100 UTM Directory Traversal
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits the WANGKONGBAO CNS-1000 and 1100 UTM appliances aka Network Security Platform. This directory traversal vulnerability is interesting because the apache server is running as root, this means we can grab anything we want! For instance, the /etc/shadow and /etc/passwd files for the special kfc:$1$SlSyHd1a$PFZomnVnzaaj3Ei2v1ByC0:15488:0:99999:7::: user

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP Vuln Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: This module identifies common vulnerable files or cgis.

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP WebDAV Internal IP Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: Detect webservers internal IPs though WebDAV

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP WebDAV Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: Detect webservers with WebDAV enabled

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP WebDAV Website Content Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: Detect webservers disclosing its content though WebDAV

vertices.shortDescription: WebPageTest Directory Traversal
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a directory traversal vulnerability found in WebPageTest. Due to the way the gettext.php script handles the 'file' parameter, it is possible to read a file outside the www directory.

vertices.shortDescription: Wordpress Brute Force and User Enumeration Utility
vertices.fullDescription: Wordpress Authentication Brute Force and User Enumeration Utility

vertices.shortDescription: Wordpress Pingback Locator
vertices.fullDescription: This module will scan for wordpress sites with the Pingback API enabled. By interfacing with the API an attacker can cause the wordpress site to port scan an external target and return results. Refer to the wordpress_pingback_portscanner module. This issue was fixed in wordpress 3.5.1

vertices.shortDescription: HTTP Blind XPATH 1.0 Injector
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits blind XPATH 1.0 injections over HTTP GET requests.

vertices.shortDescription: Yaws Web Server Directory Traversal
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a directory traversal bug in Yaws v1.9.1 or less. The module can only be used to retrieve files. However, code execution might be possible. Because when the malicious user sends a PUT request, a file is actually created, except no content is written.

vertices.shortDescription: Novell ZENworks Asset Management 7.5 Remote File Access
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a hardcoded user and password for the GetFile maintenance task in Novell ZENworks Asset Management 7.5. The vulnerability exists in the Web Console and can be triggered by sending a specially crafted request to the rtrlet component, allowing a remote unauthenticated user to retrieve a maximum of 100_000_000 KB of remote files. This module has been successfully tested on Novell ZENworks Asset Management 7.5.

vertices.shortDescription: Novell ZENworks Asset Management 7.5 Configuration Access
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits a hardcoded user and password for the GetConfig maintenance task in Novell ZENworks Asset Management 7.5. The vulnerability exists in the Web Console and can be triggered by sending a specially crafted request to the rtrlet component, allowing a remote unauthenticated user to retrieve the configuration parameters of Nozvell Zenworks Asset Managmment, including the database credentials in clear text. This module has been successfully tested on Novell ZENworks Asset Management 7.5.

vertices.shortDescription: IMAP4 Banner Grabber
vertices.fullDescription: IMAP4 Banner Grabber

vertices.shortDescription: IPID Sequence Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: This module will probe hosts' IPID sequences and classify them using the same method Nmap uses when it's performing its IPID Idle Scan (-sI) and OS Detection (-O).  Nmap's probes are SYN/ACKs while this module's are SYNs. While this does not change the underlying functionality, it does change the chance of whether or not the probe will be stopped by a firewall.  Nmap's Idle Scan can use hosts whose IPID sequences are classified as "Incremental" or "Broken little-endian incremental".

vertices.shortDescription: Lotus Domino Password Hash Collector
vertices.fullDescription: Get users passwords hashes from names.nsf page

vertices.shortDescription: Lotus Domino Brute Force Utility
vertices.fullDescription: Lotus Domino Authentication Brute Force Utility

vertices.shortDescription: Lotus Domino Version
vertices.fullDescription: Several checks to determine Lotus Domino Server Version.

vertices.shortDescription: CCTV DVR Login Scanning Utility
vertices.fullDescription: This module tests for standalone CCTV DVR video surveillance deployments specifically by MicroDigital, HIVISION, CTRing, and numerous other rebranded devices that are utilizing default vendor passwords. Additionally, this module has the ability to brute force user accounts.  Such CCTV DVR video surveillance deployments support remote viewing through Central Management Software (CMS) via the CMS Web Client, an IE ActiveX control hosted over HTTP, or through Win32 or mobile CMS client software. By default, remote authentication is handled over port 5920/TCP with video streaming over 5921/TCP.  After successful authentication over 5920/TCP this module will then attempt to determine if the IE ActiveX control is listening on the default HTTP port (80/TCP).

vertices.shortDescription: Multiple DVR Manufacturers Configuration Disclosure
vertices.fullDescription: This module takes advantage of an authentication bypass vulnerability at the web interface of multiple manufacturers DVR systems, which allows to retrieve the device configuration.

vertices.shortDescription: Borland InterBase Services Manager Information
vertices.fullDescription: This module retrieves version of the services manager, version and implementation of the InterBase server from InterBase Services Manager.

vertices.shortDescription: Java RMI Server Insecure Endpoint Code Execution Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: Detect Java RMI endpoints

vertices.shortDescription: OKI Printer Default Login Credential Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: This module scans for OKI printers via SNMP, then tries to connect to found devices with vendor default administrator credentials via HTTP authentication. By default, OKI network printers use the last six digits of the MAC as admin password.

vertices.shortDescription: Ray Sharp DVR Password Retriever
vertices.fullDescription: This module takes advantage of a protocol design issue with the Ray Sharp based DVR systems.
