vertices.fullDescription: This module migrates and logs Microsoft Windows user's passwords via Winlogon.exe. Using idle time and natural system changes to give a false sense of security to the user.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Escalate UAC Protection Bypass
vertices.fullDescription: This module will bypass Windows UAC by utilizing the trusted publisher certificate through process injection. It will spawn a second shell that has the UAC flag turned off.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Escalate SMB Icon LNK Dropper
vertices.fullDescription: This module drops a shortcut (LNK file) that has a ICON reference existing on the specified remote host, causing SMB and WebDAV connections to be initiated from any user that views the shortcut.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Escalate Get System via Administrator
vertices.fullDescription: This module uses the builtin 'getsystem' command to escalate the current session to the SYSTEM account from an administrator user account.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Escalate NtUserLoadKeyboardLayoutEx Privilege Escalation
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits the keyboard layout vulnerability exploited by Stuxnet. When processing specially crafted keyboard layout files (DLLs), the Windows kernel fails to validate that an array index is within the bounds of the array. By loading a specially crafted keyboard layout, an attacker can execute code in Ring 0.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Escalate Task Scheduler XML Privilege Escalation
vertices.fullDescription: This module exploits the Task Scheduler 2.0 XML 0day exploited by Stuxnet. When processing task files, the Windows Task Scheduler only uses a CRC32 checksum to validate that the file has not been tampered with. Also, In a default configuration, normal users can read and write the task files that they have created. By modifying the task file and creating a CRC32 collision, an attacker can execute arbitrary commands with SYSTEM privileges.  NOTE: Thanks to webDEViL for the information about disable/enable.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Escalate Microsoft .NET Runtime Optimization Service Privilege Escalation
vertices.fullDescription: This module attempts to exploit the security permissions set on the .NET Runtime  Optimization service. Vulnerable versions of the .NET Framework include 4.0 and 2.0.  The permissions on this service allow domain users and local power users to modify  the mscorsvw.exe binary.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Escalate Locked Desktop Unlocker
vertices.fullDescription: This module unlocks a locked Windows desktop by patching the respective code inside the LSASS.exe process. This patching process can result in the target system hanging or even rebooting, so be careful when using this module on production systems.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Escalate Service Permissions Local Privilege Escalation
vertices.fullDescription: This module attempts to exploit existing administrative privileges to obtain a SYSTEM session. If directly creating a service fails, this module will inspect existing services to look for insecure file or configuration permissions that may be hijacked. It will then attempt to restart the replaced service to run the payload. This will result in a new session when this succeeds. If the module is able to modify the service but does not have permission to start and stop the affected service, the attacker must wait for the system to restart before a session will be created.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather ARP Scanner
vertices.fullDescription: This Module will perform an ARP scan for a given IP range through a Meterpreter Session.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Bitcoin wallet.dat
vertices.fullDescription: This module downloads any Bitcoin wallet.dat files from the target system

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Credential Cache Dump
vertices.fullDescription: This module uses the registry to extract the stored domain hashes that have been cached as a result of a GPO setting. The default setting on Windows is to store the last ten successful logins.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Virtual Environment Detection
vertices.fullDescription: This module attempts to determine whether the system is running inside of a virtual environment and if so, which one. This module supports detectoin of Hyper-V, VMWare, Virtual PC, VirtualBox, Xen, and QEMU.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather BulletProof FTP Client Saved Password Extraction
vertices.fullDescription: This module extracts information from BulletProof FTP Bookmarks files and store retrieved credentials in the database.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather CoreFTP Saved Password Extraction
vertices.fullDescription: This module extracts saved passwords from the CoreFTP FTP client. These  passwords are stored in the registry. They are encrypted with AES-128-ECB.  This module extracts and decrypts these passwords.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Credential Collector
vertices.fullDescription: This module harvests credentials found on the host and stores them in the database.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Dyn-Dns Client Password Extractor
vertices.fullDescription: This module extracts the username, password, and hosts for Dyn-Dns version 4.1.8. This is done by downloading the config.dyndns file from the victim machine, and then automatically decode the password field. The original copy of the config file is also saved to disk.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Credential Store Enumeration and Decryption Module
vertices.fullDescription: This module will enumerate the Microsoft Credential Store and decrypt the credentials. This module can only access credentials created by the user the process is running as. It cannot decrypt Domain Network Passwords, but will display the username and location.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Google Picasa Password Extractor
vertices.fullDescription: This module extracts and decrypts the login passwords stored by Google Picasa.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather McAfee ePO 4.6 Config SQL Credentials
vertices.fullDescription: This module extracts connection details and decrypts the saved password for the SQL database in use by a McAfee ePO 4.6 server. The passwords are stored in a config file. They are encrypted with AES-128-ECB and a static key.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather FileZilla FTP Server Credential Collection
vertices.fullDescription: This module will collect credentials from the FileZilla FTP server if installed.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather FlashFXP Saved Password Extraction
vertices.fullDescription: This module extracts weakly encrypted saved FTP Passwords from FlashFXP. It finds saved FTP connections in the Sites.dat file.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather FTP Navigator Saved Password Extraction
vertices.fullDescription: This module extracts saved passwords from the FTP Navigator FTP client. It will decode the saved passwords and store them in the database.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather FTP Explorer (FTPX) Credential Extraction
vertices.fullDescription: This module finds saved login credentials for the FTP Explorer (FTPx) FTP client for Windows.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Group Policy Preference Saved Passwords
vertices.fullDescription: This module enumerates the victim machine's domain controller and connects to it via SMB. It then looks for Group Policy Preference XML files containing local user accounts and passwords and decrypts them using Microsofts public AES key.  Tested on WinXP SP3 Client and Win2k8 R2 DC.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Internet Download Manager (IDM) Password Extractor
vertices.fullDescription: This module recovers the saved premium download account passwords from Internet Download Manager (IDM). These passwords are stored in an encoded format in the registry. This module traverses through these registry entries and decodes them. Thanks to the template code of theLightCosine's CoreFTP password module.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather IPSwitch iMail User Data Enumeration
vertices.fullDescription: This module will collect iMail user data such as the username, domain, full name, e-mail, and the decoded password. Please note if IMAILUSER is specified, the module extracts user data from all the domains found. If IMAILDOMAIN is specified, then it will extract all user data under that particular category.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Credentials IMVU Game Client
vertices.fullDescription: This module extracts account username & password from the IMVU game client and stores it as loot.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Meebo Password Extractor
vertices.fullDescription: This module extracts login account password stored by Meebo Notifier, a desktop version of Meebo's Online Messenger.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather mRemote Saved Password Extraction
vertices.fullDescription: This module extracts saved passwords from mRemote. mRemote stores connections for RDP, VNC, SSH, Telnet, rlogin and other protocols. It saves the passwords in an encrypted format. The module will extract the connection info and decrypt the saved passwords.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Nimbuzz Instant Messenger Password Extractor
vertices.fullDescription: This module extracts the account passwords saved by Nimbuzz Instant Messenger in hex format.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Microsoft Outlook Saved Password Extraction
vertices.fullDescription: This module extracts and decrypts saved Microsoft Outlook (versions 2002-2010) passwords from the Windows Registry for POP3/IMAP/SMTP/HTTP accounts. In order for decryption to be successful, this module must be executed under the same privileges as the user which originally encrypted the password.

vertices.shortDescription: Razer Synapse Password Extraction
vertices.fullDescription: This module will enumerate passwords stored by the Razer Synapse client. The encryption key and iv is publicly known. This module will not only extract encrypted password but will also decrypt password using public key. Affects versions earlier than 1.7.15.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather RazorSQL Credentials
vertices.fullDescription: This module stores username, password, type, host, port, database (and name) collected from profiles.txt of RazorSQL.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather SmartFTP Saved Password Extraction
vertices.fullDescription: This module finds saved login credentials for the SmartFTP FTP client for windows. It finds the saved passwords and decrypts them.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Spark IM Password Extraction
vertices.fullDescription: This module will enumerate passwords stored by the Spark IM client. The encryption key is publicly known. This module will not only extract encrypted password but will also decrypt password using public key.

vertices.shortDescription: Steam Client Session Collector.
vertices.fullDescription: This module will collect Steam session information from an account set to autologin.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather TortoiseSVN Saved Password Extraction
vertices.fullDescription: This module extracts and decrypts saved TortoiseSVN passwords. In order for decryption to be successful this module must be executed under the same privileges as the user which originally encrypted the password.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Total Commander Saved Password Extraction
vertices.fullDescription: This module extracts weakly encrypted saved FTP Passwords from Total Commander. It finds saved FTP connections in the wcx_ftp.ini file.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Trillian Password Extractor
vertices.fullDescription: This module extracts account password from Trillian & Trillian Astra v4.x-5.x instant messenger.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather VNC Password Extraction
vertices.fullDescription: This module extract DES encrypted passwords in known VNC locations

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather AutoLogin User Credential Extractor
vertices.fullDescription: This module extracts the plain-text Windows user login password in Registry. It exploits a Windows feature that Windows (2000 to 2008 R2) allows a user or third-party Windows Utility tools to configure User AutoLogin via plain-text password insertion in (Alt)DefaultPassword field in the registry location - HKLM\Software\Microsoft\Windows NT\WinLogon. This is readable by all users.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather WinSCP Saved Password Extraction
vertices.fullDescription: This module extracts weakly encrypted saved passwords from WinSCP. It searches for saved sessions in the Windows Registry and the WinSCP.ini file. It cannot decrypt passwords if a master password is used.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather WS_FTP Saved Password Extraction
vertices.fullDescription: This module extracts weakly encrypted saved FTP Passwords from WS_FTP. It finds saved FTP connections in the ws_ftp.ini file.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Dump Recent Files lnk Info
vertices.fullDescription: The dumplinks module is a modified port of Harlan Carvey's lslnk.pl Perl script. This module will parse .lnk files from a user's Recent Documents folder and Microsoft Office's Recent Documents folder, if present. Windows creates these link files automatically for many common file types. The .lnk files contain time stamps, file locations, including share names, volume serial numbers, and more.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather AD Enumerate Computers
vertices.fullDescription: This module will enumerate computers in the default AD directory.  Optional Attributes: objectClass, cn, description, distinguishedName, instanceType, whenCreated, whenChanged, uSNCreated, uSNChanged, name, objectGUID, userAccountControl, badPwdCount, codePage, countryCode, badPasswordTime, lastLogoff, lastLogon, localPolicyFlags, pwdLastSet, primaryGroupID, objectSid, accountExpires, logonCount, sAMAccountName, sAMAccountType, operatingSystem, operatingSystemVersion, operatingSystemServicePack, serverReferenceBL, dNSHostName, rIDSetPreferences, servicePrincipalName, objectCategory, netbootSCPBL, isCriticalSystemObject, frsComputerReferenceBL, lastLogonTimestamp, msDS-SupportedEncryptionTypes

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Installed Application Enumeration
vertices.fullDescription: This module will enumerate all installed applications

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather File and Registry Artifacts Enumeration
vertices.fullDescription: This module will check the file system and registry for particular artifacts. The list of artifacts is read from data/post/enum_artifacts_list.txt or a user specified file. Any matches are written to the loot.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Google Chrome User Data Enumeration
vertices.fullDescription: This module will collect user data from Google Chrome and attempt to decrypt sensitive information.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Enumerate Computers
vertices.fullDescription: This module will enumerate computers included in the primary Domain.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Database Instance Enumeration
vertices.fullDescription: This module will enumerate a windows system for installed database instances

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Hardware Enumeration
vertices.fullDescription: Enumerate PCI hardware information from the registry. Please note this script will run through registry subkeys such as: 'PCI', 'ACPI', 'ACPI_HAL', 'FDC', 'HID', 'HTREE', 'IDE', 'ISAPNP', 'LEGACY'', LPTENUM', 'PCIIDE', 'SCSI', 'STORAGE', 'SW', and 'USB'; it will take time to finish. It is recommended to run this module as a background job.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Directory Permissions Enumeration
vertices.fullDescription: This module enumerates directories and lists the permissions set on found directories. Please note: if the PATH option isn't specified, then the module will start enumerate whatever is in the target machine's %PATH% variable.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Enumerate Domain
vertices.fullDescription: This module identifies the primary domain via the registry. The registry value used is: HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Group Policy\History\DCName.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Enumerate Domain Group
vertices.fullDescription: This module extracts user accounts from specified group and stores the results in the loot. It will also verify if session account is in the group. Data is stored in loot in a format that is compatible with the token_hunter plugin. This module should be run over as session with domain credentials.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Enumerate Domain Tokens
vertices.fullDescription: This module will enumerate tokens present on a system that are part of the domain the target host is part of, will also enumerate users in the local Administrators, Users and Backup Operator groups to identify Domain members. Processes will be also enumerated and checked if they are running under a Domain account, on all checks the accounts, processes and tokens will be checked if they are part of the Domain Admin group of the domain the machine is a member of.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Domain Enumeration
vertices.fullDescription: This module enumerates currently the domains a host can see and the domain controllers for that domain.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Generic File Collection
vertices.fullDescription: This module downloads files recursively based on the FILE_GLOBS option.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Windows Host File Enumeration
vertices.fullDescription: This module returns a list of entries in the target system's hosts file.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Internet Explorer User Data Enumeration
vertices.fullDescription: This module will collect history, cookies, and credentials (from either HTTP auth passwords, or saved form passwords found in auto-complete) in Internet Explorer. The ability to gather credentials is only supported for versions of IE >=7, while history and cookies can be extracted for all versions.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Logged On User Enumeration (Registry)
vertices.fullDescription: This module will enumerate current and recently logged on Windows users

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Product Key
vertices.fullDescription: This module will enumerate the OS license key

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Powershell Environment Setting Enumeration
vertices.fullDescription: This module will enumerate Microsoft Powershell settings

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Proxy Setting
vertices.fullDescription: This module pulls a user's proxy settings. If neither RHOST or SID are set it pulls the current user, else it will pull the user's settings specified SID and target host.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Service Info Enumeration
vertices.fullDescription: This module will query the system for services and display name and configuration info for each returned service. It allows you to optionally search the credentials, path, or start type for a string and only return the results that match. These query operations are cumulative and if no query strings are specified, it just returns all services. NOTE: If the script hangs, windows firewall is most likely on and you did not migrate to a safe process (explorer.exe for example).

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather SMB Share Enumeration via Registry
vertices.fullDescription: This module will enumerate configured and recently used file shares

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather SNMP Settings Enumeration (Registry)
vertices.fullDescription: This module will enumerate the SNMP service configuration

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Terminal Server Client Connection Information Dumper
vertices.fullDescription: This module dumps MRU and connection data for RDP sessions

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Enumerate Domain Admin Tokens (Token Hunter)
vertices.fullDescription: This module will identify systems that have a Domain Admin (delegation) token on them. The module will first check if sufficient privileges are present for certain actions, and run getprivs for system. If you elevated privs to system, the SeAssignPrimaryTokenPrivilege will not be assigned, in that case try migrating to another process that is running as system. If no sufficient privileges are available, the script will not continue.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Tomcat Server Enumeration
vertices.fullDescription: This module will enumerate a windows system for tomcat servers

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Unattended Answer File Enumeration
vertices.fullDescription: This module will check the file system for a copy of unattend.xml and/or autounattend.xml found in Windows Vista, or newer Windows systems. And then extract sensitive information such as usernames and decoded passwords.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Forensics Duqu Registry Check
vertices.fullDescription: This module searches for CVE-2011-3402 (Duqu) related registry artifacts.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Physical Drives and Logical Volumes
vertices.fullDescription: This module will list physical drives and logical volumes

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Forensic Imaging
vertices.fullDescription: This module will perform byte-for-byte imaging of remote disks and volumes

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Local NBD Server
vertices.fullDescription: Maps remote disks and logical volumes to a local Network Block Device server. Allows for forensic tools to be executed on the remote disk directly.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Deleted Files Enumeration and Recovering
vertices.fullDescription: This module list and try to recover deleted files from NTFS file systems. Use the FILES option to guide recovery. Let it empty to enumerate deleted files in the DRIVE. Set FILES to an extension (Ex. "pdf") to recover deleted files with that extension. Or set FILES to a comma separated list of IDs (from enumeration) to recover those files. The user must have into account file enumeration and recovery could take a long time, use the TIMEOUT option to abort enumeration or recovery by extension after that time (in seconds).

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Local User Account Password Hashes (Registry)
vertices.fullDescription: This module will dump the local user accounts from the SAM database using the registry

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Local Admin Search
vertices.fullDescription: This module will identify systems in a given range that the supplied domain user (should migrate into a user pid) has administrative access to by using the Windows API OpenSCManagerA to establishing a handle to the remote host. Additionally it can enumerate logged in users and group membership via Windows API NetWkstaUserEnum and NetUserGetGroups.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Process Memory Grep
vertices.fullDescription: This module allows for searching the memory space of a proccess for potentially sensitive data.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows NetLM Downgrade Attack
vertices.fullDescription: This module will change a registry value to enable the sending of LM challenge hashes and then initiate a SMB connection to the SMBHOST datastore. If an SMB server is listening, it will receive the NetLM hashes

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Local User Account SID Lookup
vertices.fullDescription: This module prints information about a given SID from the perspective of this session

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather IP Range Reverse Lookup
vertices.fullDescription: This module uses Railgun, calling the gethostbyaddr function to resolve a hostname to an IP.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Screen Spy
vertices.fullDescription: This module will incrementally take desktop screenshots from the host. This allows for screen spying which can be useful to determine if there is an active user on a machine, or to record the screen for later data extraction. NOTES: set VIEW_CMD to control how screenshots are opened/displayed, the file name will be appended directly on to the end of the value of VIEW_CMD (use 'auto' to have the module do it's best...default browser for Windows, firefox for *nix, and preview app for macs). 'eog -s -f -w' is a handy VIEW_CMD for *nix. To suppress opening of screenshots all together, set the VIEW_CMD option to 'none'.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Local and Domain Controller Account Password Hashes
vertices.fullDescription: This will dump local accounts from the SAM Database. If the target host is a Domain Controller, it will dump the Domain Account Database using the proper technique depending on privilege level, OS and role of the host.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather TCP Netstat
vertices.fullDescription: This Module lists current TCP sessions

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather USB Drive History
vertices.fullDescription: This module will enumerate USB Drive history on a target host.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Privileges Enumeration
vertices.fullDescription: This module will print if UAC is enabled, and if the current account is ADMIN enabled. It will also print UID, foreground SESSION ID, is SYSTEM status and current process PRIVILEGES.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Run Specified WMIC Command
vertices.fullDescription: This module will execute a given WMIC command options or read WMIC commands options from a resource file and execute the commands in the specified Meterpreter session.

vertices.shortDescription: Microsoft Word UNC Path Injector
vertices.fullDescription: This module modifies a remote .docx file that will, upon opening, submit stored netNTLM credentials to a remote host. Verified to work with Microsoft Word 2003, 2007 and 2010 as of January 2013. In order to get the hashes the auxiliary/server/capture/smb module can be used.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Manage Add User to the Domain and/or to a Domain Group
vertices.fullDescription: This module adds a user to the Domain and/or to a Domain group. It will check if sufficient privileges are present for certain actions and run getprivs for system. If you elevated privs to system,the SeAssignPrimaryTokenPrivilege will not be assigned. You need to migrate to a process that is running as system. If you don't have privs, this script exits.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Manage Network Route via Meterpreter Session
vertices.fullDescription: This module manages session routing via an existing Meterpreter session. It enables other modules to 'pivot' through a compromised host when connecting to the named NETWORK and SUBMASK.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Manage Proxy Setting Cloner
vertices.fullDescription: This module copies the proxy settings from the current user to the targeted user SID, supports remote hosts as well if remote registry is allowed.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Manage Local User Account Deletion
vertices.fullDescription: This module deletes a local user account from the specified server, or the local machine if no server is given.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Manage Download and/or Execute
vertices.fullDescription: This module will download a file by importing urlmon via railgun. The user may also choose to execute the file with arguments via exec_string.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Manage Enable Remote Desktop
vertices.fullDescription: This module enables the Remote Desktop Service (RDP). It provides the options to create an account and configure it to be a member of the Local Administrators and Remote Desktop Users group. It can also forward the target's port 3389/tcp.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Manage Certificate Authority Injection
vertices.fullDescription: This module allows the attacker to insert an arbitrary CA certificate into the victim's Trusted Root store.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Manage Hosts File Injection
vertices.fullDescription: This module allows the attacker to insert a new entry into the target system's hosts file.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Manage Process Migration
vertices.fullDescription: This module will migrate a Meterpreter session from one process to another. A given process PID to migrate to or the module can spawn one and migrate to that newly spawned process.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Manage Local Microsoft SQL Server Authorization Bypass
vertices.fullDescription: When this module is executed, it can be used to add a sysadmin to local SQL Server instances. It first attempts to gain LocalSystem privileges using the "getsystem" escalation methods. If those privileges are not sufficient to add a sysadmin, then it will migrate to the SQL Server service process associated with the target instance. The sysadmin login is added to the local SQL Server using native SQL clients and stored procedures. If no instance is specified then the first identified instance will be used.  Why is this possible? By default in SQL Server 2k-2k8, LocalSystem is assigned syadmin privileges. Microsoft changed the default in SQL Server 2012 so that LocalSystem no longer has sysadmin privileges. However, this can be overcome by migrating to the SQL Server process.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Manage Inject in Memory Multiple Payloads
vertices.fullDescription: This module will inject in to several process a given payload and connecting to a given list of IP Addresses. The module works with a given lists of IP Addresses and process PIDs if no PID is given it will start a the given process in the advanced options and inject the selected payload in to the memory of the created module.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Manage Local NBD Server for Remote Disks
vertices.fullDescription: Maps remote disks and logical volumes to a local Network Block Device server. Allows for forensic tools to be executed on the remote disk directly.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Manage Memory Payload Injection Module
vertices.fullDescription: This module will inject into the memory of a process a specified windows payload. If a payload or process is not provided one will be created by default using a reverse x86 TCP Meterpreter Payload.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Manage Persistent Payload Installer
vertices.fullDescription: This Module will create a boot persistent reverse Meterpreter session by installing on the target host the payload as a script that will be executed at user logon or system startup depending on privilege and selected startup method.  REXE mode will transfer a binary of your choosing to remote host to be used as a payload.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Manage PowerShell Download and/or Execute
vertices.fullDescription: This module will download and execute a PowerShell script over a meterpreter session. The user may also enter text substitutions to be made in memory before execution. Setting VERBOSE to true will output both the script prior to execution and the results.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Manage PXE Exploit Server
vertices.fullDescription: This module provides a PXE server, running a DHCP and TFTP server. The default configuration loads a linux kernel and initrd into memory that reads the hard drive; placing a payload to install metsvc, disable the firewall, and add a new user metasploit on any Windows partition seen, and add a uid 0 user with username and password metasploit to any linux partition seen. The windows user will have the password p@SSw0rd!123456 (in case of complexity requirements) and will be added to the administrators group.  See exploit/windows/misc/pxesploit for a version to deliver a specific payload.  Note: the displayed IP address of a target is the address this DHCP server handed out, not the "normal" IP address the host uses.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Manage Reflective DLL Injection Module
vertices.fullDescription: This module will inject into the memory of a process a specified Reflective DLL.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Manage Certificate Authority Removal
vertices.fullDescription: This module allows the attacker to remove an arbitrary CA certificate from the victim's Trusted Root store.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Manage Host File Entry Removal
vertices.fullDescription: This module allows the attacker to remove an entry from the Windows hosts file.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Manage Remote Packet Capture Service Starter
vertices.fullDescription: This module enables the Remote Packet Capture System (rpcapd service) included in the default installation of Winpcap. The module allows you to set up the service in passive or active mode (useful if the client is behind a firewall). If authentication is enabled you need a local user account to capture traffic. PORT will be used depending of the mode configured.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Manage Run Command As User
vertices.fullDescription: This module will login with the specified username/password and execute the supplied command as a hidden process. Output is not returned by default, by setting CMDOUT to false output will be redirected to a temp file and read back in to display.By setting advanced option SETPASS to true, it will reset the users password and then execute the command.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Manage Safe Delete
vertices.fullDescription: The goal of the module is to hinder the recovery of deleted files by overwriting its contents. This could be useful when you need to download some file on the victim machine and then delete it without leaving clues about its contents. Note that the script does not wipe the free disk space so temporary/sparse/encrypted/compressed files could not be overwritten. Note too that MTF entries are not overwritten so very small files could stay resident within the stream descriptor.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Manage Smart Process Migration
vertices.fullDescription: This module will migrate a Meterpreter session. It will first attempt to migrate to winlogon.exe . If that fails it will then look at all of the explorer.exe processes. If there is one that exists for the user context the session is already in it will try that. Failing that it will fall back and try any other explorer.exe processes it finds

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Manage Create Shadow Copy
vertices.fullDescription: This module will attempt to create a new volume shadow copy. This is based on the VSSOwn Script originally posted by Tim Tomes and Mark Baggett.  Works on win2k3 and later.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Manage List Shadow Copies
vertices.fullDescription: This module will attempt to list any Volume Shadow Copies on the system. This is based on the VSSOwn Script originally posted by Tim Tomes and Mark Baggett.  Works on win2k3 and later.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Manage Mount Shadow Copy
vertices.fullDescription: This module will attempt to mount a Volume Shadow Copy on the system. This is based on the VSSOwn Script originally posted by Tim Tomes and Mark Baggett.  Works on win2k3 and later.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Manage Set Shadow Copy Storage Space
vertices.fullDescription: This module will attempt to change the ammount of space for volume shadow copy storage. This is based on the VSSOwn Script originally posted by Tim Tomes and Mark Baggett.  Works on win2k3 and later.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Manage Get Shadow Copy Storage Info
vertices.fullDescription: This module will attempt to get volume shadow copy storage info. This is based on the VSSOwn Script originally posted by Tim Tomes and Mark Baggett.  Works on win2k3 and later.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Manage Webcam
vertices.fullDescription: This module will allow the user to detect installed webcams (with the LIST action) or take a snapshot (with the SNAPSHOT) action.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Recon Computer Browser Discovery
vertices.fullDescription: This module uses railgun to discover hostnames and IPs on the network. LTYPE should be set to one of the following values: WK (all workstations), SVR (all servers), SQL (all SQL servers), DC (all Domain Controllers), DCBKUP (all Domain Backup Servers), NOVELL (all Novell servers), PRINTSVR (all Print Que servers), MASTERBROWSER (all Master Browswers), WINDOWS (all Windows hosts), or UNIX (all Unix hosts).

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Recon Resolve Hostname
vertices.fullDescription: This module resolves a hostname to IP address via the victim, similiar to the Unix dig command

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Recon Resolve IP
vertices.fullDescription: This module reverse resolves a range or IP to a hostname

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Wireless BSS Info
vertices.fullDescription: This module gathers information about the wireless Basic Service Sets available to the victim machine.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Wireless Current Connection Info
vertices.fullDescription: This module gathers information about the current connection on each wireless lan interface on the target machine.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Disconnect Wireless Connection
vertices.fullDescription: This module disconnects the current wireless network connection on the specified interface.

vertices.shortDescription: Windows Gather Wireless Profile
vertices.fullDescription: This module extracts saved Wireless LAN profiles. It will also try to decrypt the network key material. Behaviour is slightly different bewteen OS versions when it comes to WPA. In Windows Vista/7 we will get the passphrase. In Windows XP we will get the PBKDF2 derived key.

vertices.shortDescription: PHP Command Shell, Find Sock
vertices.fullDescription: Spawn a shell on the established connection to the webserver. Unfortunately, this payload can leave conspicuous evil-looking entries in the apache error logs, so it is probably a good idea to use a bind or reverse shell unless firewalls prevent them from working. The issue this payload takes advantage of (CLOEXEC flag not set on sockets) appears to have been patched on the Ubuntu version of Apache and may not work on other Debian-based distributions. Only tested on Apache but it might work on other web servers that leak file descriptors to child processes.

vertices.shortDescription: Generic Shell Variable Substitution Command Encoder
vertices.fullDescription: This encoder uses standard Bourne shell variable substitution  tricks to avoid commonly restricted characters.

vertices.shortDescription: Generic ${IFS} Substitution Command Encoder
vertices.fullDescription: This encoder uses standard Bourne shell variable substitution to avoid spaces without being overly fancy.

vertices.shortDescription: printf(1) via PHP magic_quotes Utility Command Encoder
vertices.fullDescription: This encoder uses the printf(1) utility to avoid restricted characters. Some shell variable substituion may also be used if needed symbols are blacklisted. Some characters are intentionally left unescaped since it is assummed that PHP with magic_quotes_gpc enabled will escape them during request handling.

vertices.shortDescription: The "none" Encoder
vertices.fullDescription: This "encoder" does not transform the payload in any way.

vertices.shortDescription: XOR Encoder
vertices.fullDescription: Mips Web server exploit friendly xor encoder

vertices.shortDescription: XOR Encoder
vertices.fullDescription: Mips Web server exploit friendly xor encoder

vertices.shortDescription: PHP Base64 Encoder
vertices.fullDescription: This encoder returns a base64 string encapsulated in eval(base64_decode()), increasing the size by a bit more than one third.

vertices.shortDescription: PPC LongXOR Encoder
vertices.fullDescription: This encoder is ghandi's PPC dword xor encoder with some size tweaks by HDM.

vertices.shortDescription: PPC LongXOR Encoder
vertices.fullDescription: This encoder is ghandi's PPC dword xor encoder but uses a tag-based terminator rather than a length.

vertices.shortDescription: SPARC DWORD XOR Encoder
vertices.fullDescription: This encoder is optyx's 48-byte SPARC encoder with some tweaks.

vertices.shortDescription: XOR Encoder
vertices.fullDescription: An x64 XOR encoder. Uses an 8 byte key and takes advantage of x64 relative addressing.

vertices.shortDescription: Alpha2 Alphanumeric Mixedcase Encoder
vertices.fullDescription: Encodes payloads as alphanumeric mixedcase text. This encoder uses SkyLined's Alpha2 encoding suite.

vertices.shortDescription: Avoid underscore/tolower
vertices.fullDescription: Underscore/tolower Safe Encoder used to exploit CVE-2012-2329. It is a modified version of the 'Avoid UTF8/tolower' encoder by skape. Please check the documentation of the skape encoder before using it. As the original, this encoder expects ECX pointing to the start of the encoded payload. Also BufferOffset must be provided if needed.  The changes introduced are (1) avoid the use of the 0x5f byte (underscore) in because it is a badchar in the CVE-2012-2329 case and (2) optimize the transformation block, having into account more relaxed conditions about bad characters greater than 0x80.

vertices.shortDescription: Non-Alpha Encoder
vertices.fullDescription: Encodes payloads as non-alpha based bytes. This allows payloads to bypass both toupper() and tolower() calls, but will fail isalpha(). Table based design from Russel Sanford.

vertices.shortDescription: Non-Upper Encoder
vertices.fullDescription: Encodes payloads as non-alpha based bytes. This allows payloads to bypass tolower() calls, but will fail isalpha(). Table based design from Russel Sanford.

vertices.shortDescription: Polymorphic XOR Additive Feedback Encoder
vertices.fullDescription: This encoder implements a polymorphic XOR additive feedback encoder. The decoder stub is generated based on dynamic instruction substitution and dynamic block ordering. Registers are also selected dynamically.
